segments.text: I see the water pouring over the sink, and the woman is just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already wet, but she’s still drying that plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall off that stool, and the girl is just waiting for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how unaware everyone is in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading all over the floor, and no one is reacting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a slow-motion disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to slip and fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever notice what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a recipe for a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
